column5: Heard about a deadly fire up Peterborough way hope no board members were involved http://www.torontosun.com/2016/12/25/toronto-family-killed-in-peterborough-area-cottage-fire always bad especially this time of year.  Kawartha Kev
The fire was only a few miles from me, lousy news for sure.
CHCH TV says 4 dead... Very Sad News Indeed  Condolences to the Family
